CREATE PROC [dbo].[usp_CreateExternalObjects] 
    @Yr     VARCHAR(4),
    @Mt     VARCHAR(2),
    @Dy     VARCHAR(2)

--CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'YourPasswordHere@&'

    @col VARCHAR(1000),
    @loc VARCHAR(1000),
    @sql VARCHAR(1000)

/****************************************history_historicalpaymentcardaccount****************************************/
SET @tbl = 'history_historicalpaymentcardaccount'
SET @Col = 
    '
    [id] INT,
    [created] DATETIME,
    [change_type] VARCHAR(6),
    [instance_id] VARCHAR(255),
    [channel] VARCHAR(255),
    [user_id] INT,
    [body] VARCHAR(4000),
    [change_details] VARCHAR(255)
    '
--Drop external tables, if exists
SET @sql = 'IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(''dbo.ext_' + @tbl + ''') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ext_' + @tbl
EXEC(@sql)
--Drop external file format, if exists
SET @sql = 'IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = ''eff_' + @tbl + ''')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT eff_' + @tbl
EXEC(@sql)
--Drop external data sources, if exists
SET @sql = 'IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = ''eds_' + @tbl + ''')
    DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE eds_' + @tbl
EXEC(@sql)

--CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE
SET @loc = 'abfss://datalake@binkuksouthproddwh.dfs.core.windows.net/Hermes/public_' + @tbl + '/'
SET @sql = 
    'CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE eds_' + @tbl + '
    WITH    (   
            LOCATION = ''' + @loc + ''',
            CREDENTIAL = SynapseIdentity,
            TYPE = HADOOP
            )'
EXEC(@sql);

--CREATE AN EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT FOR PARQUET FILES  
SET @sql = 'CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT eff_' + @tbl + '  
WITH (  
         FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET, 
         DATA_COMPRESSION = ''org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec''
    );'
EXEC(@sql);

--CREATE AN EXTERNAL TABLE TO STAGE THE DATA
SET @loc = 'https://binkuksouthproddwh.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/Hermes/public_' + @tbl + '/' + @Yr + '/' + @Yr+@Mt + '/' + @Yr+@Mt+@Dy + '/'
SET @sql = 
    'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ext_' + @tbl + ' (' + @Col + ')
    WITH    (   
            LOCATION = ''' + @Yr + '/' + @Yr+@Mt + '/' + @Yr+@Mt+@Dy + '/'',
            DATA_SOURCE = eds_' + @tbl + ', 
            FILE_FORMAT = eff_' + @tbl + '
            )'

EXEC(@sql);
